website_summaries.verdict: The bass-forward Bose SoundSport Free earphones are expensive, but nail the design and operational details better than any other pair in the growing wire-free category.
pros: Powerful audio performance with boosted bass response

customer_reviews.title: Pure Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Worst BOSE product ever! Do not waste your money. Connection constantly drops out even when battery is 100%. Support will tell you it’s the nature of master/slave connections. Just a crap product.
customer_reviews.author: m blavk

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Currently sat on a beach connecting and reconnecting this device which has 100% battery but keeps disconnecting and turning off. Ultimately a huge let down. Having already owned a pair of bose quietq35 ii which I love I thought these would be a worthwhile additional pair for the gym and more subtle occasions however I'm very disappointed by how unreliable they are as I could have brought my £20 pair with me and they have never been so unresponsive. Very unfortunate as I love Bose as a brand but clearly this model has its hang ups.
customer_reviews.author: Pav

customer_reviews.title: Great for workouts, avoid if you want to watch youtube video's
customer_reviews.text: The fit is excellent for me. I use them for running and even on long, sweaty runs they don't budge. They are very comfortable and i don't notice they are there. I love the charging case and the sound quality is great. What i don't like: The volume buttons on the right ear plug have very poor feedback and it takes several hard pushes to get the volume to adjust Youtube has a sync issue which as of May18 hasn't been resolved. I don't get this issue with my Plantronics backbeat fit's so this is a Bose issue.
customer_reviews.author: PianoNut

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is top notch, probably one of the best sets of wireless headphones that I have used. Had the beats wired headphone for my gym but it didn't last long. After 2-3 months it didn't work so had to replaced it. 5 hrs battery life is good but it could have done better. It lagged when I was using this to watch YouTube videos on ipad. But it didn't matter to me because the main reason I bought this was for my workout. And it turn out to be great.
customer_reviews.author: Kaji

customer_reviews.title: Can’t fault them - but now after 6 months use ******
customer_reviews.text: Just as I expected from Bose brilliant sound quality. No problem with Bluetooth connection. Video sync sound ok with all films only poor with low quality YouTube video. Really good ear fit and never come loose in the gym. Get 4-5 hrs battery life even on high volume. ****** after 6 months use - Still feel this is a great product for sound quality & gym use. But - As other reviews comment they won't work in a hot climate above about 30 deg.C ambient temp, this is a big issue for me & I hope bose respond to peoples comments. And - As others report I have trouble when connecting to my laptop when only one pod will connect.
customer_reviews.author: chris c.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gym Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Love these in ear headphones by Bose! I thought these were expensive when i firstly bought them but after so many months of using them i have changed my mind! Positives : Perfect for Gym lovers Battery Life is good Good for Sharing with your Gym buddy Don't look stupid when in. Bose App is easy to install and very simple to connect Negatives : Difficult to get into my ears ( i may have weird ears, so not voting down ) Not really good for handsfree when outside as person cannot hear clearly
customer_reviews.author: Samlads

customer_reviews.title: Bose destroying their previously solid brand with these
customer_reviews.text: Having had these for over 6m i found that with either apple ipads or my iphone they dropped off bluetooth a lot and oddly much more when static (eg sitting or lying down) than when moving. Having 3 other bose products i am a fan of this company - but these are a disgrace. Their bluetooth interface is clearly flawed and if theyve fixed it since june 2018 when i bought these, they should contact every purchaser and provide an upgrade as this is detrimental to their brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dgdgdg

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: Sound sometimes goes out of sync and the charger has started to play up and occasionally won’t charge, will be sending back to Bose
customer_reviews.author: Mr S. McConachie

customer_reviews.title: Read The Amazon Reviews!!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews from various sites and did not find much said about the drop-out problem. Should have read the Amazon reviews. I have bn a follower of Bose equipment for many years, starting off with the original noise cancelling headphones (the ones with the separate on/off switch). I still have them and they still work perfectly. I have their wave systems still working perfectly. These headphones are not worthy of the Bose name, I've had them for less than a week and am sending them back for a refund as not fit for use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr D J W Melville

customer_reviews.title: Latency and Lag. Avoid
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend that you avoid these earphones. Theres a huge delay on sound which makes them useless for watching video and only really good for streaming music. Whilst comfortable and the sound is good I think it was a big mistake for Bose not to put the new bluetooth qualcomm chips in these. Sadly Bose keeps blaming the lag on the software which is just utter tripe as I have a pair of Airpods that work perfectly on youtube and netflix.
customer_reviews.author: NickJ

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and high quality product. WHEN IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Dreadful constant dropout of sound, even when connected to an Iphone less than 30 cm away! No way can these be used in a gym. I also performed a firmware update to the latest version - made no difference at all. Returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound lag on watching video
customer_reviews.text: I am Bose fan and its sound quality is excellent. I am returning these headphones because sound lags on watching videos on YouTube. I used them with my iPhone with all latest updates. Still lag....
customer_reviews.author: Dr

customer_reviews.title: Great but disconnects spoil it.
customer_reviews.text: When they work, they are excellent. Unfortunately it seems I am suffering the same issues that others have been suffering. Constant left ear disconnects. It takes around 15 seconds for it to reconnect. I’ve paired it with various different devices and it still happens. Shame really.
customer_reviews.author: K Davis

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else or wait for the new set
customer_reviews.text: Likes: sound quality in ear comfort Dislikes: signal dropping in an out CONSTANTLY! range is awful (beats are better) very large so don't bother putting your hood up in the rain, you'll knock them out and then potentially have someone either stand on them, they fall down the drain etc. no noise cancelling, so although good sound quality if its loud outside you can't hear them buttons lack a tactile feel, sometimes you're not sure if you've pressed the button or not, have to get that sweet spot to feel the click. Overall do not buy. Bose really need to improve this product.
customer_reviews.author: jevon

customer_reviews.title: Left headphone disconnecting frequently
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately i am returning these since they were not performing as expected. Left headphone kept on disconnecting even after pairing, re-pairing, re-installing, downloading latest app update, IOS update. EVERYTHING. I am dissapointed on BOSE,, such a brand keeps a product that had this issues for a while. I've read some reviews and this might have been a problem, comments two years ago. I thought they would have enhanced prouct and application, BUT i found this issue unfortunaly.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquín Gómez Almeyra

customer_reviews.title: Superb earbuds all-round.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace some dreadful Sony earbuds I returned. Phenomenal sounding earbuds across musical genres. Initially tested with Def Leppard's 'Hysteria' album. I heard things in that album that I'd never heard before. The detail, depth and clarity of these is something else, not to mention bass response, which on 'Gods of War' sounded phenomenal. The earbuds are exceptionally comfortable and feel sturdy, as you'd expect from a premium brand like Bose. The charging case is great, compact and looks stylish. The accompanying app is good, easy to use and has a nice added touch with the 'find my earbuds' feature. Connection to my iPhone X by Bluetooth is effortless and reliable. No drop-outs at all. Very happy indeed.
customer_reviews.author: James Kirby

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. Perfect fit (S) and perfect sound. Keep disconnecting tho
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: TOTAL RUBBISH. After the last app update they just do not work anymore. Disappointed. What a shitty product by bose. I received it yesterday and I already love them so much! I'm at the gym right now and they're perfect for working out. Although, the right one is perfect and so comfortable that I even forget it, the left one for me is a bit painful. IS NOT a product's issue! I have a trago piercing on my left ear. What I'm saying is: they're very comfy BUT if you have a Trago it hurts cause it pushes the piercing too much. UPDATE: been using for 1 week, they jeep disconnecting.
customer_reviews.author: Flora

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my husband. He tells me that the sound quality is excellent. The earphones are really comfortable to wear and feel secure enough that they wouldn’t just fall out. They are too bulky to fit under a motorcycle helmet - just in case anyone is considering this... The earphones charge in their carry case which is nice and compact (and needs charging itself now and again..) Hubby is very happy with these earphones!
customer_reviews.author: Loobizaz

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love them, but they are just so unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Today, I have given up on these EarPods, after a year, I’ve just had enough of them. I can never rely on them to both work. When they do work, they have great sound and are amazing. It just whenever I open the case, about 75% of the time the left ear will be flat and won’t play or both have drained. If your reading the reviews and see more positive reviews than negative then I might just be unlucky, but if you go online and even in Bose support site and have a look a lot of people have problems with them not charging correctly and working.
customer_reviews.author: P. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really like these headphones, had BOSE before and bought BOSE again because of the secure fit. Sound quality is a very good standard and battery life is decent. I get about 3 hours, then if i charge in the charging cradle it comes with i get about another 3 hours, they easily last a day. They are not designed for noise cancelling though, so don't buy if that is what you are looking for. The headphones do stick out from your ears quite a lot if that is something you may be conscious of. I get very occasional drop of signal, but re-establishes itself quickly. I would expect this with a wireless headset though.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Hunjan

customer_reviews.title: Great full rich sound but not without some design fit and BT sync issues
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality! Supplied with 3 earbud/sharkfin boots that have same bud size for each boot. Not a big fan of the sharkfin as one ear has a good fit while the other seems suspect. Over ear clips would be a good adder but then the box they come in would need a redesign. Occasionally left earbud does.'t sync to Bluetooth but it seems to be OK if you power on your phones BT first then pull the left earbud out of the box first and then the right. No video audio sync issues as I have seen reported by others: so phone video or YouTube is good.
customer_reviews.author: MamboRocks

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best earphones I’ve ever owned. I bought this for running and to use it in gym and they just do what I bought them for. The sound quality is just fantastic!!! I am a big Bose fan and they never disappoint. The bass is extremely good and takes music to the next level. They are loud.... I mean loud! The only drawback is latency against videos but it doesnt bother me. I have a home theater for that. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great audio but do not buy if want to watch video
customer_reviews.text: Per the title. These headphones are great but they suffer badly from video/audio synch and Bose's advice is that "because they are designed for music and not video, this synch issue is normal behavior" I bough these for a variety of uses, including using for video and music when commuting/travelling. I'm returning them because they're useless for video. Apple manage to make wireless headphones that work so why not Bose?
customer_reviews.author: Skwerl

customer_reviews.title: Way too big and heavy, plus expensive
customer_reviews.text: Sent these back due to them being very heavy in my ears, they don't sit well and even when using the rubber attachments to suit ur ear size, they don't stay in ur ear. Plus the left ear bud didn't work
customer_reviews.author: Tan

customer_reviews.title: Occasional loss of sound but still good
customer_reviews.text: I did my homework on this product as I was considering the newly released Samsung buds at the time. I knew that many many people had problems with sound 'drop out' but still decided to go ahead with this. I have experienced issues especially when outdoors with the left earpiece. The overall sound quality and engineering is pretty good but I expect better form Bose at this price point. I paid about £179 forbthe blue version but I would be more comfortable if I had paid £130 due to thenoccasional drop out.
customer_reviews.author: Aggers

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality but terrible sound isolation
customer_reviews.text: Tried these in a shop before purchase and was blown away by the sound quality and general quality of the product. My use for them is commuting and I realised within 10 minutes these were not suitable. As they are 'sport' headphones they are designed to let in a lot of external sound (which makes sense if you're out running). But this means they are totally unsuitable for any environments which are noisy such as trains, busy city streets etc. I really wanted to like these - all they need is a different type of earbud which seals and they would be great but as they are they are useless unless you're in a library.
customer_reviews.author: mynameisrob

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound and build
customer_reviews.text: Really nice pleasant sound. Fairly warm with some depth. I must say though - they were larger than I expected and I felt a little Borg or Uhura in wearing these. In summary, Pro's : Reasonable price (for what you get) Great build feel from buds and case Good sounds quality buttons a little stiff ? Cons : A little large for my liking Case is also too big for something to be kept in a pocket Maybe take a look at Sennheiser momentum true wireless - as they're smaller and have a better sound in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: buttons

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Noise Cancelling Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my birthday after far too much procrastinating and researching noise cancelling headphones! I also tested and trialled another Bose set with leads but these were far superior. They ARE noise cancelling and the sound quality is in my opinion better than my daughter’s Apple AirPods. They very occasionally loose connection on certain podcasts I listen to but very rarely and only momentarily. I would recommend and have used for 2 months. They also stay in my ears which was a worry before I bought!
customer_reviews.author: JacYDo

customer_reviews.title: Wife is very happy
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed, but then I love Bose products, easy to set-up, pair and the wife says the sound is better than her wired Bose earphones. I don't really understand why the software download is required and the written instructions are way too light, pairing across multiple devices is a challenge without instructions other than take them out of the case. Also, Bose Connect suggests iTunes and Tune-In, but we use Amazon, just don't get Bose Connect at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J.

customer_reviews.title: Poor conection
customer_reviews.text: Left one keeps disconnecting. Both of them have a poor connection to the device conecting and signal drops even if the device is less the a meter. They fail at half way on software left one keep disconnecting in the middle of the uppdate every single time. Buttons on the buds are really hard to press and interact.
customer_reviews.author: Tresca

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to write a good review of these headphones as I have many Bose products and on a whole are happy with them. These are however an exception! They're utterly unreliable, bad Bluetooth connectivity and they will not work in sunshine! So forget using them on holiday you'll end up wanting to throw them in the pool. Currently on the 7th attempt to update the firmware. Update: now on 12th attempt and now left bud refuses to connect. Now attempting to contact Bose and tell them they can have this garbage back!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound, and nobrisk of dropping out
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I have a mini bose speaker which is amazing. I'm still working out how to change a track, change the volume and pick up calls, but I love these headphones. I'm training for a half marathon and they fit perfectly, no wobble, I know they won't just fall out, so much better than cable ones - I don't have anything flapping round my neck as I go. And the sound, it's incredible. Lovely, lovely. I highly recomend these.
customer_reviews.author: K. T. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my DH to replace another brand he had tried and sent back. They were primarily to be used for work calls. He found these had good sound quality, but they didn't stay pair very well and having sound come out of only one ear for calls wasn't working. We ended up returning these. It was too much money to spend on something that didn't work the way you wanted it to. In the end he went with over the ear and was much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Alybee25

customer_reviews.title: Works with Fenix 5 plus
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to work with Garmin Fenix 5 plus watch. Paired nicely and sound quality great. A few drop out initially when going for a run but seems to stabilise after couple of minutes, not sure if that is because watch is also picking up GPS data or pairing with chest strap. Seems to work about the same left or right wrist ( watch connection ) Sound quality excellent , bass amazing and detail vibrant. Dropped a star as not too great when running without my hat to keep them tight to my head.
customer_reviews.author: anthony lake

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is useless!
customer_reviews.text: If you could extend the battery life on these then you’d have a good pair of earphones, not that they are bad, they just require a little more. The only other gripe is that the controls aren’t easy and aren’t that user friendly. Update: If I hadn’t missed the return deadline these would’ve gone back. They’re the worst Bose product that I’ve ever had the misfortune of owning. The battery life is absolutely awful.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T.

customer_reviews.title: Audiophile review: excellent sound and reliability for the price
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are easy to connect and I have experienced no connectivity or synchronicity issues to date. The sound quality is as you would expect of a Bose product (very good) and the design follows suit. They really do not come loose no matter how hard you try with the extra wing tip parts to secure it in your ear. The battery could be slightly better but the charging case is a huge bonus and make them very appropriate for travelling, even over long distance.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart R

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but other issues
customer_reviews.text: I do like these, but.... If in the case for over 48hrs they drain which tells me the case doesn't trickle top up but rather constantly over charges. They do stick out a bit and are heavy in the ears. The sound quality is excellent when the left one doesn't drop out. I love the way Bose deal with base. Unable to use with my Surface pro - the main reason for buying. Overall perhaps not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: JEG

customer_reviews.title: The dogs bo****ks!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit fiddly to insert into your ears but once in they feel very secure and comfy. The sound quality is far superior than others I have tried. They sound better than the RHA ones. The bass is very good for such small buds. I dont work out so I cant comment on that. Over-all these are excellent and well worth the money. I highly reccomend these. Proper good and the dogs boll**ks!! If you are looking for really good quality truly wireless ear buds then look no further. Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.author: John Shonfield

customer_reviews.title: I bounce, they don’t.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1hr cycle commute to work, from west to east London, right through the heart of the city. I’m a music manic so I wanted a pair of headphones that stayed in my little ears as I rode furiously, sounded great, and noise cancelled we’ll, but not too much for the traffic. These are perfect. They stay in no matter how much snappy Head rotation and sudden movements I make. They sound great whether I’m listening to Russell Brand’s spoken podcast, Jazz, Classical, Deep Dub, Rock or Pop. Phone calls are a little quiet is my only criticism, but not a major one. Lightweight, comfortable, good sound, waterproof. Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: S. GOSLING

customer_reviews.title: They fit well and sound great
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic earphones and what I expected from Bose.I have used them a lot since I bought them and they have become my go to earphones.I have to say that they stick out a bit from your ears but they are still excellent earphones and I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit, sound, and build quality but hardly sound isolation.
customer_reviews.text: First off, the quality of the build and sound is perfect and just what is expected of Bose. The Bluetooth connection is rock solid and I have left my phone 10m away whilst in the gym and it’s still maintained a stable connection. Now the bad (for me), whilst the Stayhear tips fit my ears perfectly and stop them falling out, the noise leakage is horrendous. They do nothing to block out outside noise which is arguably good when you’re running as you can hear everything around you. I’d have preferred more sound isolation but the trade off for the amazing sound has not been a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: LPS

customer_reviews.title: DESIGNED SO THE LEFT EAR WILL NEVER WORK ON PHONE CALLS!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot really believe this, however they are designed so that only the right ear will work on phone calls. If you dont believe me, look at the comments on the Bose Community website. I will be returning these now. For a pair of headphones - this is a basic right? A £2 pair from the garage would work with both sides! I am shocked. Bose - you should be ashamed of yourselves. I thought you were leading the market. Guess I need to think again!
customer_reviews.author: simon white

customer_reviews.title: Good buds, bulky but bassy
customer_reviews.text: They are greaylt for the price. But are bulky as hell. Bassy and powerful punches. Charge in case doesnt hold, drains gradually. Does get comfortable after an hour. Does not fall out when running or jogging, perfect for joggers. Good for the price mark, but there is better in the market for dearer, like the B&O e8's. Pairs with phone and runs some apps without lag, but all ear buds lag with some apps. I had to unfortunately return these as i compared them to the B&Os, and couldnt go back to these after.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin

customer_reviews.title: Left earbud frequently cuts out
customer_reviews.text: Left earbud cuts out frequently. I have updated firmware and unpaired and paired the earbuds. Disappointed as I have a few Bose products and have never had problems with them. Will be returning these and going back to my Soundsport wireless headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: connection is very bad
customer_reviews.text: after giving this as a present for christmas only 8 weeks ago after a few uses it did not work properly it jumps in and out of signal all the time even when at home it is now to laet to send back so stuck with a very expensive purchase that does not work but luckily amazon are so good they have allowed me to return for full refund and choose another item so all good in the end
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality (particularly the base)
customer_reviews.text: We have been really impressed with the sound quality of these headphones and particularly the base, which is usually what suffers in in-ear headphones. The battery has been fine - although I did buy a separate charging case as suggested by Amazon, however, it was not compatible as these are truly wireless headphones rather than just the wireless ones (which have a wire connecting the ear pieces) confusingly.
customer_reviews.author: NKG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Fits very comfortably,great sound,very easy to change volume and good value for money.If i have to add one minor niggle i would say when watching video there is a delay in signal, so lips do not sinc with sound,which i find annoying,and have to switch back to wired earphones. If listening to music your main reason for buying i don't think you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: william henden

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant sound
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the Bose ear buds. The sound was very good, loved the charging case even though it was quite large. The feel of the buds and charger were quality and well made. Unfortunately I couldn’t get on with how they looked on my head. The buds stuck way to far out of my ears making me feel and look like an alien. The other problem was no noise cancelling so you could everything going on around you, which is a good thing when your out and about. But if you travel on the tube you’d need to turn the sound right up. I return them back to Amazon and had a refund
customer_reviews.author: Carray

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with clear sound.
customer_reviews.text: Should have just bought these in the first place, after trying many cheap ones and being disappointed with them, I am now very happy with these Bose. I’m surprised how far I can be from the source and the Blue tooth connection does not drop out, I can be in any room of the house and even out in the garden, maybe 15 meters or more away and still no drop out.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stead

customer_reviews.title: These sound good but are not very good for running.
customer_reviews.text: So these were fairly good, if you pushed them in well they would stay in your ear for a while but after 20 minutes of running I found I was constantly pushing them back into position, also the sound was adversely affected by windnoise as they stick out a bit too far, these are expensive for something that does not do what they are designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Jon Brough

customer_reviews.title: These catagorically do not work in hot climates.
customer_reviews.text: Plus Points: Sound is good. Fit is good, with 3 different size adaptable buds. Connecting devices was easy (though I am in a low Bluetooth usage environment). Negative Points: These totally shut down when used outside in direct sunlight. Place in your hand or other shade for a couple of minutes and they power up again. Move back into sun and a couple of minutes later they shut down again. And left bud did lose connection on occasion. Summary: Great product if only they worked in the sunshine; now returning them unfortunatly.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a replacement/upgrade from my previous headphones (Sony WF-SP700N). Issue with charging case which couldn't be repaired, so was offered an Amazon voucher instead! Although these headphones are not "Noise cancelling", that doesn't matter as the sound quality, fitting etc is second to none! The holding/ charging case is brilliant & the earphones are magnetic, so no trying to get it to fit into a tight space, like my previous Sony ones! These can even connect to my iMac, so saves me having to buy a separate pair of headphones! Money saved, money spent, well worth it in every way!
customer_reviews.author: D W Hankinson

customer_reviews.title: Not as bad as some reviews suggest.
customer_reviews.text: Theyre not as bad as some of the reviews suggest. Sound is great. Noise cancellation isnt its best feature as it lets in wind and noise but suits me as you sometimes need to be semi aware of surroundings. Ive tried a few different brands at around this price range theyre the best ive had. They also improve stability each time theres a software update. 150 quids a decent buy.
customer_reviews.author: BigAl

customer_reviews.title: Best Buds!
customer_reviews.text: Having bought these despite mixed reviews, I have been far from disappointed. The sound is easily as good as my QC30s and QC35s. I was prepared for a bit of dropping, having experienced that problem with the ‘30s, but nothing. I’ve used them for several hours without any drop out, even when a reasonable distance from my phone (iPhone XS). The bass is definitely the best I’ve come across in such small buds it’s deep and the treble is as good. Pairing with an iPhone couldn’t be easier either, just take them out of the charging case. If BT is on on the phone, they pair straight away without doing anything. Great little buds, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Khoggy

customer_reviews.title: the left one stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I paired these up ok and they were great then within weeks the left one just wont connect at all the right is fine. I now wear one which is not idea such a shame their comfy to wear and fit really well but for 100 pounds I expected them to work. I have done everything to try to get them to work as shown on line but still does not work I have wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: adrian russell-smith

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I read SO many reviews. Ordered the Jabra wireless ones and sent them back the next day as the app didn't work and the sound quality was dreadful. In true Bose fashion, these exceeded my expectations. Also, there are MANY reviews about them not working in the heat - I went to Thailand for 3 weeks and they worked without any glitches (while sitting outside) so I'm not sure if Bose have made improvements but it wasn't an issue for me! Yes, they are a little large over the ear but, for the quality, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron

customer_reviews.title: Running, great quality, comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a good quality pair of earphones for running, as soon as you see these little babies they scream quality. They have a really cool little case to store them in and charge. The fit is very good with other size adaptors to ensure a snug fit. The battery can easily last a marathon distance for me and the lack of any wires at all is really cool. Sound quality is much better than the Apple ones I used previously but I’m not really an expert there! If you run and can afford them, their fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Benoi

customer_reviews.title: All great except....
customer_reviews.text: Firstly I absolutely love these Bose earbuds. They are brilliant for working out and when they are working 100% the sound is excellent as you would expect with Bose. My only gripe is that occasionally the sound goes and then after a second or two returns. As I said this is occasionally, and sometimes never but it can be annoying when it happens as the sound is so good you don’t want it interrupting. I don’t know why it does it, maybe interference from some other network maybe?
customer_reviews.author: John Boy

customer_reviews.title: Not Perfect  ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these EarPods they look great and they are Bose however for me they have two main flaws the first is the audio lag whilst watching videos , it just out of sync ! The second issue is the button operation, I found the buttons are hard to depress resulting in the EarPods becoming dislodged from your ear which is far from ideal if you are out jogging or cycling. The sound quality is adequate and they are very comfortable however the above issues means I will be changing them for a different product
customer_reviews.author: p walklate

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I used these earphones for couple of weeks. Lovely sound quality. For me was bad experience when i am running. I do it in the hoodie so earphones touching the hoodie and it really feels like will fall down. The second problem with left earphone. The sound disappearing some times for a second. That is bad for earphones for 150.
customer_reviews.author: Iuri

customer_reviews.title: The worst wireless earbuds available
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is not really that good for Bose, you can only take calls from one of the buds at once and there is a VERY NOTICEABLE lag on video to the audio so it is impossible watch anything with these. I was unable to use the volume adjust and the buttons on the product as they were to hard to press. The worst thing I’ve ever bought from Bose, do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, poor performance
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately not great the left earpiece does work. Or comes on intermittently. Therefore I'm sending it back. I'd like to try again with a better quality set. As I know Bose make good products
customer_reviews.author: Ade

customer_reviews.title: Sensational Bose SoundSport...
customer_reviews.text: Sensational ...The SoundSport Free wireless headphones fit perfectly and the Bass is bang on point. Also unlike other Bose wire headphones the volume goes very high (warning: do not play too loud owing to possible damage to hearing). ...initially I bought the Jabra Actives and they simply fell out my ears even using the largest bud, the bass was v.poor to. So a massive thumbs up to Bose 👍
customer_reviews.author: H. Consulting Limited

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Really good product, the sound was good and fit really well. My only negative feedback would be the fact it sticks out quite a bit from the ear. It was winter and I couldn’t wear a hood as it would keep hitting it and moving it. A bit annoying when you are trying to concentrate on other things. That’s the only negative
customer_reviews.author: Robert Martindale

customer_reviews.title: Nice Headphones but Connectivity Problems present
customer_reviews.text: Using an iPhone X. Had constant connectivity issues over bluetooth. Music would randomly stop and needing to be restarted to work [powered down]. Became annoying and irritating kit. Have returned to amazon. Purchased a set of air pods and some rubber ear guards and its perfect for gym and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Arnault1983

customer_reviews.title: Great Sounding Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Just returned a pair of Jabra 65t to Argos for a refund as had connection issues with the left ear piece. Also depending how the fit was in the ear adjusted the bass and loudness level and on occasions fell out whilst walking and training in the gym. Just purchased the Bose SoundSport Free Truly Wireless Sport Headphones Sound quality is far superior and max volume is higher, the Jabra's don't come close to these !! Build quality and fit are also a lot better. Extremely Pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: R B Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of in-ear headphones.
customer_reviews.text: A really good set of in-ear headphones that don't slip or fall out. Sound quality is impressive, however the buttons are quite hard to press but I normally just make all the adjustments I need with my phone. the Noise cancellation is nothing to boast about, but it does however let you listen to the outside world whilst still getting a good level of audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stick to earphones
customer_reviews.text: The link to both ear buds seems to drop out and only sound from one ear, charge doesn’t last very long
customer_reviews.author: The Reids

customer_reviews.title: Ear buds hurt in your ear after 30 mins of wearing
customer_reviews.text: Ear buds hurt in your ear after 30 mins of wearing. Also there is a lag between sound and picture if you are watching something on your phone via bluetooth. I bought Anker earphones for £20 something, and they are BRILLIANT! Disappointed by Bose. Not comfortable and not worth the price too. Returned and refunded, thanks to Amazon's brilliant customer service. (Courier Hermes, lost these earphones on return, thank god I had the courier insured - just fyi)
customer_reviews.author: Ashish

customer_reviews.title: will not connect to windows pc
customer_reviews.text: I cannot connect this item to my pc there is no app for it. apple items no problem, very good sound good volume some things on the noise cancelling does but not that much, fits very good and the charge time is good they last for the time use them. would I buy this item or the upgrade ? if up to this standard YES. you can at the time of writing this review get a trade in on your old bose but I found them cheaper from this seller. GOOD PRODUCT GOOD PRICE GREAT DELIVERY.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had to return this. They kept disconnecting from my phone completely. When they were working the volume control was way too fiddly, the sound was good, but the overall product was disappointing which is coming from someone who would choose Bose first over everything else. Sorry Bose, not great dudes.
customer_reviews.author: Philthetrucker

customer_reviews.title: One ear bud stops working after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I boughht these at the beginning of the year and one ear bud has stopped working already. Save your money and but a more reliable product
customer_reviews.author: S D Richards

customer_reviews.title: Reassuringly good sound and build quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these earbuds, really easy to set up and think the bose connect app is a real plus. Sound is full and rich, having upgraded from multiple cheaper alternatives this was always going to be the reason and I am very impressed with the difference. They fit very well, stay in place and are very comfortable. Haven't experienced any connection issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: DannyW

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Picked these over airpods but I wish I had just gone with something else now. I used these daily and the audio cuts out when you connect the other ear, also lags on youtube. I eventually lost the other ear jogging because it fell out. The quality is great but it doesn't go very loud
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality but less comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Bose is known for its sound quality and these are no different. I like the find the device feature in bose app that let's me locate the geo location of the device while it emits alarm sound. The orange color I ordered looks different and less appealing than how it looked in the picture. If you wear it for a few minutes your ear starts hurting unlike the bose headphone. I am going to try it for a few day to see if my ears adapt to it but most probably I am going to return them since they are not most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: anoop

customer_reviews.title: Bose  doesn’t disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Well I’m not surprised ! It’s all in the name BOSE. Just returns Jaba elite 65t for loosening Bluetooth signal Rubbish. These have blown me away. May it long continue. It’s not the first product I have from them. 3ks worth of cinema equipment worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Martin caiazzo

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Really like these, worth looking up how to to wear them properly online as I walked around with them hanging out for the first couple of days due to the wrong size sports tips being on them. Once I swapped to the large ones (included along with small ones), I was up and running!
customer_reviews.author: SteveJ

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, these headphones are great sounding for everyday listening, with sufficient battery life that recharges quickly once returned to the case. Furthermore, the Bluetooth connection has a good range and connects to mobile devices promptly. However the main reason I am writing this review is the customer service, I had an issue with the headphones which was primarily my fault, and after a few brief exchanges over email, Bose supplied me with a fresh pair of new headphones in less than the estimated time of arrival
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, very secure
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on the recommendation of my sister. She uses them for running, I use them for the bumpy bus journey across Manchester for work! Very easy to use, comfortable and hold their charge very well
customer_reviews.author: T. Eden

customer_reviews.title: Earth shatteringly good sound
customer_reviews.text: What a great pair of headphones I just watched blade runner on my iPhone and the bass is earth shattering these head phones are great brilliant app aswell awesome product well done Bose handy battery case and so comfortable and hold in the ear so securely
customer_reviews.author: Andy Bates

customer_reviews.title: Left ear sound cuts out
customer_reviews.text: At first I liked these. Well comfy and sound great, also very minimal vibration noise from walking/running. However I kept suffering from a drop of connection in the left ear which was very off putting. For that reason I had to return them. I’ll buy the SoundSport buds with the cord linking them instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably comfortable, charge is brilliant, sound quality is amazing and I can barely hear people trying to talk to me when I haven’t got anything playing. Only downsides are that I’ve had a couple of occasions when the headphones have turned themselves off at full battery and due to their size they do create a lot of wind noise when cycling etc.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, amazing sound quality and good build quality. I guess a small let down is the fact they won't stay in my ear when I run, but I can say that about 99% of headphones. You can't use these while laying down on your side but perfect to use while commuting/travelling and in the gym. I haven't had any lag/sound issues with videos or the headphones dropping in and out of range.
customer_reviews.author: Ben B

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pair less than a year ago for me and my girlfriend and where both really disappointed. The reviews say they're good but in reality you have to chage them non stop. If you fully charge them and the charge case, use them once for say 20mins. If I don't use them again for say a week ill come back to them completely drained and the charge case will be completely drained which tells me that the case charges them then once charged will drain them and its self completely. Happens with both sets of headphones. If I could id get my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for the Peloton Bike
customer_reviews.text: Firstly I'm a Bose fan, but this is their worse product. The customer support via WhatsApp was appalling. The fit is great and when works sounds is great. However the sound delay (lag) is too much if exercising via streaming, such as Peloton. Also sometimes the left earbud, would not sync. This is frustrating when you want to excercise, as cant be bothered trouble shooting wasting time. After reviewing other earbuds, going for Powerbeats Pro instead. Sadly they will cost more, but a better product.
customer_reviews.author: onlyme1210

customer_reviews.title: So far so goooood!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few different type of wireless in ear head phones previously. I purchased these because my previous set stopped working on one side. So far these are working out just fine. Only downside is the size, but I guess that is what helps deliver great sounds, oh the other minor thing is that they do council out the noise but only when you turn the volume up!
customer_reviews.author: Gazbo

customer_reviews.title: Had to return these
customer_reviews.text: I thought Bose would be quality but these aren't. Syncing with my Apple Watch was difficult and the left earbud rarely connected at all. No way of adjusting the tone and you have to press the buttons really hard to make them work. Go for the Jabra - far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Bose is a Brand and does not need reviews
customer_reviews.text: The product was awesome with sound but the only 2 things which were a trouble was connectivity and there used be a lag while watching Videos. Not sure if mine was defective product as just one of a case or its a fault by Bose
customer_reviews.author: J.G

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear with excellent sound quality. Good noise cancellation whilst listening to media but when paused excellent external sound quality of external noise. All in all a very good buy. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is superb but overall the product is very poor. They are very awkward to fit into the ear and fall out very easily. The volume and particularly the pause button are terrible to use and will often end up with the bud falling out of the ear. Very disappointed with them and unfortunately I have given up and replaced them.
customer_reviews.author: nimo

customer_reviews.title: So Good!
customer_reviews.text: Having had Bose headphones before there was only one company i was using for ear pods as their in ear fit is perfect for my ears! I can never use the apple earphones as they don't fit and fall out, not a problem with Bose, you can jump around without worry
customer_reviews.author: Marc Le Cornu

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Sound was excellent but left ear keeps cutting out and are useless for making calls
customer_reviews.author: Mr MC Brown

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Likes: sound quality is outstanding, comfortable, great charging station, quoted 5hr battery life, no wires, overall great design. Dislikes: not as secure in the ear as I would like, dropping out once while cycling.
customer_reviews.author: dave_cumbria

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic product! Didn't expect Bose will produce anything like it
customer_reviews.text: Really bad product! It keeps cutting out, on call people complain they can't hear me. Initially didn't use it much but now when I am travelling or walking music keeps cutting out. Left earphones stops working then starts. Really not impressed paid a fortune for this and now can't even return it. Amazon please help!
customer_reviews.author: Ranjana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent audio quality and form factor. Fundamentally flawed design.
customer_reviews.text: For an audio only experience these are fantastic. However they are not designed for video content. After two replacements Bose customer support informed me that a 1-2 second lag when watching videos (YouTube, Netflix, BBC iPlayer) was expected as "these headphones are engineered to listen to music only. The audio/video sync issue is unacceptable for headphones at this price range. I have returned these and purchased the Sennheiser Momentum Free earphones which satisfy my requirements.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So, after a year the charging case start to have some problems!!! Doesn’t always find immediately the earphones when you put it to charge!!! But the quality of the earphones is Bose so you know what you buy
customer_reviews.author: silvano

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but significant delay when watching video
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and seems stable and well fitted in ear. But... Can only connect to one device at a time. Serious connection delays when watching video, without which they are of no use to me. I have Bose Quiet Comfort 35 and there were comments from Bose re delays with those, but they are fine when watching on my phone with a very slight delay when connecting to my TV. But these.. feels like I am in the twilight zone.. do not recommend if you are going to watch video.
customer_reviews.author: LCJ

customer_reviews.title: Review after 5 months+ still love them
customer_reviews.text: 1.Sounds amazing bass is just right(I use it in the gym) 2. Battary good will last 5/6 workouts befor you neet to charge the case i work out for about 60-90mins at a time for reference 3. Verry Comfortable 4. Good noise cancellation Bad point cable you get to charge it with is small only I don't know exactly the length but is under 10cm
customer_reviews.author: Dean Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Best there is
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant. Same quality as the QC35s but less cumbersome for running. Choice of 3 sizes that attach to the earpiece that fits inside your ear, ensuring choice of best fit. Bose are a great innovative company.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. Oreilly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful clear sound, volume can be controlled either on the phones or via the app. Noise cancelling amazing. Extremely light and stay fixed in the ear well Battery charge lasts well.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Eagles

product_meta.title: Bose SoundSport Free, True Wireless Earbuds, (Sweatproof Bluetooth Headphones for Workouts and Sports), Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:Earphones onlyNo wires mean no limits. And Bose sound sport free headphones are completely wireless, so you can enjoy total freedom of movement with nothing not even a single cord in your way. The acoustic package is designed to deliver sound so clear and powerful it will motivate you to go faster, lift heavier and train longer. Bluetooth technology transmits music from your phone to the headphones, so music plays reliably and consistently whether your phone is in your nearby gym bag, pocket or strapped to your arm. Worried your earbuds will fall out during your workout? don't be. Stay hear, sport tips are built to stay comfortably in place, even when you're training hard. And if you can't find an earbud, all hope is not lost. You can track down lost earbuds using the Bose connect app's “find my buds” feature. It shows when and where the earbuds were last connected to your phone. Still having trouble finding your earbuds? don't worry, an audio signal from the headphones can Alert you to their location. Don't sweat your sweat (or the weather) either, because water repellent materials Inside the earbuds help keep moisture out. Off a single charge, the earbuds play for up to five hours, and the fully charged case gives you an additional 10 hours of music, ready to play when you are. When not in use, the charging case is designed with built in magnets to keep the earbuds securely in place. Play or pause tracks and access your phone's Siri or your Google assistant right from the earbud. You can even take phone calls, through the right earbud only.
feature_bullets: TRULY wireless Sport headphones for total freedom of movement, packed full of technology that makes music sound clear and powerful
Earbuds are sweat and weather resistant (with an Ipx4 rating) and come with 3 different pairs of Stay hear and Sport tips (in sizes S/M/L) that provide a comfortable and secure fit
Up to 5 hours of play time with each charge and an additional 10 hours with the included charging case and also features a charging time of 2 hours
Track lost earbuds with the Bose connect App's "find My buds" feature

Firmware update to improve Audio video synchronization for customers using iPhones, iPads and other Bluetooth devices that support AVDTP version 1.3 or later, available via connect app. Connectivity Technology: Wireless Bluetooth

SoundSport Free headphones have an integrated dual microphone array located on the right earbud to allow you to use them during calls when connected to a smartphone that supports Bluetooth. Call audio will only be heard in the right ear bud

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars21,657 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
